programme.title: Horse Camp: A Love Tail
programme.desc: É um novo ano no campo de equitação de verão, mas desta vez, está tudo diferente: um novo conselheiro chefe, novos amigos para conquistar e, para melhorar as coisas, o fazendeiro tem uma paixão pela instrutora de equitação!

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: Um Perfeito Estranho
programme.desc: Quando a jornalista Rowena Price descobre que o homicídio da sua amiga pode estar relacionado com o poderoso executivo Harrison Hill, infiltra-se numa grande companhia publicitária com o intuito de o desmascarar.

programme.title: A Barbearia 3: O Próximo Corte
programme.desc: Quando o ambiente no bairro da Barbearia do Calvin se torna cada vez pior, à medida que os dias passam, a fiel clientela junta-se para mudar a vizinhança para melhor.

programme.title: Festa de Natal da Empresa
programme.desc: A diretora-geral Carol Vanstone tenta encerrar a sucursal do seu irmão folião, pelo que ele e o seu diretor técnico, Josh Parker, têm de reunir os colegas de trabalho e dar a mais estrondosa festa de Natal! Tudo para impressionar um potencial cliente, que irá salvar os seus empregos.

programme.title: A Experiência Belko
programme.desc: Numa retorcida experiência social, 80 americanos são trancados no edifício dos escritórios da sua empresa em Bogotá, na Colômbia. Entretanto, recebem ordens de uma voz misteriosa, que os instiga a participar num jogo mortal que implica matar ou ser morto...

programme.title: Rob Roy
programme.desc: Este filme retrata a história do herói escocês do século XVIII, Robert Roy MacGregor. Entre cenários de beleza fantástica e a dura vida da comunidade, Rob Roy vê-se forçado a pedir dinheiro emprestado ao sinistro Montrose quando um duro inverno ameaça as majestosas Terras Altas escocesas.

programme.title: Platoon - Os Bravos do Pelotão
programme.desc: Chris Taylor, um jovem e ingénuo americano, decide alistar-se como voluntário para combater na Guerra do Vietname. Chris pertence a um pelotão comandado pelo sargento Elias Grodin, um homem conhecedor e humanitário, e pelo sanguinário sargento Robert Barnes.

programme.title: A Desaparecida, o Aleijado e os Trogloditas
programme.desc: O xerife Franklin Hunt junta um grupo de homens para tentar resgatar uma jovem sequestrada. Mas o que ele não imagina é que os seus inimigos são canibais, que vivem à margem da civilização e vão transformar o resgate numa missão de sobrevivência.

programme.title: 47 Metros de Terror
programme.desc: Numa viagem ao México, duas irmãs aventuram-se num mergulho para observar os tubarões. No entanto, tudo corre terrivelmente mal quando o cabo que prendia a jaula de observação se parte e ambas ficam presas no fundo do oceano a 47 metros de profundidade...

programme.title: Horse Camp: A Love Tail
programme.desc: É um novo ano no campo de equitação de verão, mas desta vez, está tudo diferente: um novo conselheiro chefe, novos amigos para conquistar e, para melhorar as coisas, o fazendeiro tem uma paixão pela instrutora de equitação!

programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

programme.title: Ouro
programme.desc: A história verídica de Kenny Wells, um explorador desesperado por descobrir ouro e enriquecer, que forma equipa com um geólogo tão ambicioso quanto ele. Wells inicia então uma fantástica viagem em busca de ouro, nas profundezas da selva indonésia.

programme.title: Mãos de Pedra
programme.desc: Um filme biográfico sobre o pugilista Robert Durán, que segue a sua ascensão desde as ruas do Panamá até aos grandes triunfos do mundo do boxe.

Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Mike Listo, Steven DePaul, David Straiton, Michael Patrick Jann, Allison Liddi-Brown

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

programme.title: Despojos de Inverno
programme.desc: Ree, de 17 anos, luta para encontrar o pai, procurado pela polícia, que desaparece após usar a sua casa como fiança. Confrontada com a possibilidade de perder a casa onde mora com os irmãos, Ree desafia os códigos de silêncio que imperam na sua comunidade e arrisca a vida para salvar a família.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Ray Breslin, especialista em estruturas de segurança, aceita um desafio: fugir de uma instalação ultrassecreta e de alta tecnologia, "O Túmulo". Mas, uma vez prisioneiro, Breslin descobre que foi enganado e é considerado como um preso de verdade.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Seus Olhos
programme.desc: Uma equipa de investigadores do FBI vê-se dividida, quando descobre que a filha da agente Jess foi assassinada. Treze anos depois, após uma obsessiva busca pelo assassino, surge uma nova pista. Mas ninguém está preparado para um inconfessável segredo.

programme.title: Crime Sangrento
programme.desc: Depois de mudar-se para Seattle, Daniel Pruitt, um detetive da polícia, atende aos pedidos da mulher Jessica e concorda em acampar na floresta. Quando ele vai comprar comida ela é atacada, mas Jessica consegue fugir e Daniel encontra-a caída no meio da estrada.

programme.title: Mar de Chamas
programme.desc: Dois irmãos bombeiros, que não gostam um do outro, vão ter que trabalhar juntos para apanhar um incendiário criminoso.

programme.title: Martin e Lewis
programme.desc: A história da relação conturbada de 10 anos entre Dean Martin e Jerry Lewis.

programme.title: Força Anti-Crime
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1949. Mickey Cohen, um impiedoso gangster, tem a cidade na sua mão. Contra um gangue protegido pela crescente corrupção, Bill Parker recruta o sargento John O'Mara, reunindo uma unidade especial para repor a justiça. As ordens não são para prender criminosos, mas sim iniciar uma guerra.

programme.title: Alta Golpada
programme.desc: Josh Kovacs gere um dos mais sumptuosos e protegidos edifícios de Nova Iorque. Quando Arthur Shaw, o magnata da Wall Street que habita a "penthouse", é mantido em prisão domiciliária, acusado de roubar mais de dois milhões de dólares, Josh e os empregados do prédio entram em pânico.

programme.title: Dinheiro Quente
programme.desc: Seth Davis desistiu da faculdade, mas, para tentar viver à altura dos padrões de exigência do pai, arranja emprego como corretor numa empresa de investimento e começa rapidamente a ter sucesso. Só que nesse emprego nem tudo é tão legal como parece.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: De visita a Atenas, o casal Chester e Colette faz amizade com um guia local. Mas, quando este faz uma visita, vê-se forçado a esconder o corpo inconsciente de um homem que supostamente terá atacado o casal. O trio acaba envolvido num crime do qual não pode mais fugir.

programme.title: Aqui Há Gato!
programme.desc: Tom Brand é um bilionário com pouco tempo para a família. Mas quando a filha lhe pede (novamente) um gato como prenda de aniversário, Tom decide aceder. De regresso a casa, tem um acidente e, quando recupera a consciência, percebe que está preso dentro do corpo do gato.

programme.title: Depois da Terra
programme.desc: Uma aterragem forçada deixa o adolescente Kitai Raige e o seu lendário pai, Cypher, presos na Terra, mil anos depois da Humanidade ter escapado a eventos cataclísmicos. Com Cypher gravemente ferido, Kitai embarca numa perigosa viagem para pedir ajuda.

programme.title: A Chave do Sucesso
programme.desc: Três vendedores num quarto de hotel a reflectir sobre a vida num divertido e envolvente confronto.

programme.title: Mapas Para as Estrelas
programme.desc: Uma viagem ao coração de uma família de Hollywood e ao mundo supérfluo e tortuoso das celebridades egoístas e dos seus assistentes. Ao mesmo tempo que se procuram a si próprios, à fama e aos fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: Manchester By The Sea
programme.desc: A vida do solitário Lee Chandler é irreversivelmente transformada quando volta à sua cidade natal para cuidar do sobrinho. Patrick ficou órfão e Lee foi nomeado tutor do jovem de 16 anos. Mas além das dificuldades evidentes que tem pela frente, o regresso de Lee vai ainda reabrir feridas antigas.

programme.title: O Cavalheiro Com Arma
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de Forrest Tucker, considerado o ladrão mais simpático de sempre. Forrest escapou audaciosamente da prisão de San Quentin aos 70 anos e fez uma série de assaltos que baralharam as autoridades e encantaram o público.

programme.title: Balas & Bolinhos - O Último Capítulo
programme.desc: A vida continua difícil para Culatra, Rato e Bino. Mas tudo muda quando Tone, o homem do Mundo, regressa a casa para tentar salvar o pai, que está às portas da morte. E quando o reencontro acontece partem para a mais surpreendente das suas aventuras.

programme.title: O Sorriso das Estrelas
programme.desc: Numa estalagem, uma mãe de família, que se encontra em processo de divórcio, e um cirurgião, que acaba de sofrer, também ele, um grande trauma, apaixonam-se.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos
programme.desc: Uma aluna do liceu suspeita que os assassinatos do Campus estão relacionados com Lendas Urbanas.

programme.title: Tudo a Nu Na Normandia
programme.desc: Numa localidade da Normandia, a crise afetou profundamente os rendimentos das famílias, mas ninguém consegue chamar a atenção do Governo. Quando um artista, famoso pelas suas fotografias de nus, ali passa, surge a oportunidade de dar nas vistas...

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: A meio de uma carreira na vanguarda do jazz moderno, Miles Davis afasta-se abruptamente da vida pública. Sozinho em casa, Miles é atormentado por dores, pela sua voz musical entorpecida por drogas e pela mente assombrada por fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: Crime Sangrento
programme.desc: Depois de mudar-se para Seattle, Daniel Pruitt, um detetive da polícia, atende aos pedidos da mulher Jessica e concorda em acampar na floresta. Quando ele vai comprar comida ela é atacada, mas Jessica consegue fugir e Daniel encontra-a caída no meio da estrada.

programme.title: Força Anti-Crime
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1949. Mickey Cohen, um impiedoso gangster, tem a cidade na sua mão. Contra um gangue protegido pela crescente corrupção, Bill Parker recruta o sargento John O'Mara, reunindo uma unidade especial para repor a justiça. As ordens não são para prender criminosos, mas sim iniciar uma guerra.

programme.title: O Cavalheiro Com Arma
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de Forrest Tucker, considerado o ladrão mais simpático de sempre. Forrest escapou audaciosamente da prisão de San Quentin aos 70 anos e fez uma série de assaltos que baralharam as autoridades e encantaram o público.

programme.title: O Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Numa cidade, prestes a festejar o seu centenário, os habitantes tornam-se vítimas de espetros assassinos que escondem um segredo inquietante.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: O fotógrafo Dennis Stock tenta aproximar-se do ator em ascensão James Dean, a fim de conseguir um grande destaque para a revista Life. No entanto, James não lhe torna a tarefa fácil.

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Depois de 20 anos fora de Edimburgo, Mark Renton está de regresso à Escócia, o único lugar a que alguma vez chamou casa. À sua espera estão os velhos amigos: Spud, Sick Boy e Begbie. Muito mudou, mas muito ficou na mesma...

programme.title: Resgate
programme.desc: Um milionário proprietário de uma companhia de aviação descobre que o seu filho, de nove anos, foi sequestrado e pedem-lhe um resgate de dois milhões de dólares. Inicialmente prontifica-se a pagar o resgate, mas quando conclui que vão matar o seu filho após o pagamento, decide reverter o jogo.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie é o primeiro robô com a capacidade de pensar e sentir por si mesmo. Contudo, essa é uma ideia perigosa e um desafio que colocará Chappie no caminho de poderosas e destrutivas forças, que pretendem que ele seja o último da sua espécie.

programme.title: Amor, Estúpido e Louco
programme.desc: Cal Weaver acha que tem o casamento perfeito até que Emily lhe pede o divórcio. Cal, agora solteiro, parte em busca do amor com a ajuda do perito em mulheres Jacob Palmer. Entre paixonetas e encontros, Cal e Jacob percebem que sem a pessoa certa o amor não é só estúpido e louco, é também impossível!

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Cortar o Mal Pela Raiz
programme.desc: Uma ex-advogada, agora florista numa pequena cidade, Abby Knight, tem um bom faro para investigação e rapidamente se envolve num caso de homicídio, juntamente com o ex-detetive particular, Marco Salvatore, dono do bar local.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Arranjos de Lírios
programme.desc: Abby Knight é uma bela ex-advogada e proprietária de Bloomers, uma pitoresca loja de flores. Abby e Marco, dono de um bar e ex-investigador, descobrem o corpo de Jack Sutcliff, um vigarista que tentou interromper o casamento da prima de Abby.

programme.title: A Outra Bolena
programme.desc: As duas irmãs Bolena são incitadas pelo pai a reforçar a posição social da família, pela conquista de favores do rei de Inglaterra. Inicialmente, Mary torna-se amante do rei e tem um filho ilegítimo. Mas Anne consegue afastar tanto a irmã como a mulher do rei, com um único objetivo: ser rainha.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Anna Karenina
programme.desc: Rússia czarista, final do século XIX. Anna é casada com Alexei Karenin, um destacado oficial. Mas tudo muda quando conhece o irresistível conde Vronsky, que altera a visão que ela tem de si e do mundo. Porém, o caso amoroso torna-se conhecido e Karenin sofre com as humilhações da opinião pública.

programme.title: Um Dia Perfeito
programme.desc: Para o escritor Robert Harlan, a vida tornou-se num sonho perfeito quando o seu primeiro romance foi um "best-seller", fazendo dele o centro das atenções.

programme.title: A Escolha de um Pai
programme.desc: Um cowboy profissional tem de superar a perda da mulher, cuidar das filhas e ainda enfrentar uma tia, que vem pedir a custódia das meninas.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alleypat"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny French detective series","reviewBody":"It's funny in subtle ways. It's serious about the crime. I like that It's not full of blood and guts. The cast is perfect. As a mom, I can totally relate to Renoir's domestic delimmas interfering with work, and work interfering with her home life. I watch on Amazon Prime with subtitles. I highly recommend this show.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Arranjos de Lírios
programme.desc: Abby Knight é uma bela ex-advogada e proprietária de Bloomers, uma pitoresca loja de flores. Abby e Marco, dono de um bar e ex-investigador, descobrem o corpo de Jack Sutcliff, um vigarista que tentou interromper o casamento da prima de Abby.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Lapsos Fatais
programme.desc: Billie Blessings passa de idolatrada chef, dona de restaurante e anfitriã de uma rubrica no programa da manhã, a suspeita principal num caso de homicídio quando um dos executivos da estação de televisão morre envenenado.

programme.title: Ligações Perigosas
programme.desc: Na França libertina do século XVIII, a Marquesa de Morteuil desafia o seu ex-amante, o Visconde de Valmont, a seduzir Madame de Tourvel, uma bela mulher, casada e temente a Deus. Ambos iniciam assim um perigoso jogo de seduções e enganos.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Jeu de Main, Jeu de Vilain
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: A Paixão de Shakespeare
programme.desc: Atormentado pelas dívidas, por um bloqueio criativo e pelos ensaios: as coisas não podiam estar a correr pior para o jovem William Shakespeare. O dramaturgo encontra inspiração em Viola De Lesseps, prometida a um lorde. A paixão é inevitável e, em vez da prometida comédia, escreve "Romeu e Julieta".

programme.title: Uma Noite Com o Presidente
programme.desc: Andrew Shepherd é Presidente dos EUA e apaixona-se por uma ecologista de um grupo de pressão, que é uma intrigante política a favor do ambiente. À medida que o romance progride, a popularidade de Andrew começa a cair.

programme.title: O Bairro da Máfia
programme.desc: Após um período no exército, onde participou na Operação Tempestade no Deserto, Tommy, o filho de um mafioso de Filadélfia, é forçado por um agente do FBI a infiltrar-se no negócio da família para provar que a máfia siciliana está a tentar dominar o tráfico de heroína nos EUA.

programme.title: O Assassino de Clovehitch
programme.desc: Tyler vive no seio duma família pobre mas feliz. Ao descobrir que o pai esconde pornografia, teme que ele seja o serial-killer da cidade que anda a monte. Para tentar salvar a família, Tyler junta-se a Kassi, uma jovem obcecada com a lenda de Clovehitch.

programme.title: Duelo Imortal III
programme.desc: Pensando que ganhou o derradeiro Prémio e é o único imortal, Connor MacLeod vê a sua vida pacata terminar quando Kane, que estava há séculos preso numa gruta no Japão, se vê liberto do seu túmulo e parte em busca do espadachim para o matar.

programme.title: Ursinho Procura-se
programme.desc: Michel perdeu o ursinho de peluche da filha no aeroporto de Roissy e é contactado por alguém que o afirma ter encontrado e que reclama a recompensa. Só que o caminho para chegar ao brinquedo vai ser tudo menos fácil.

programme.title: Todo o Dinheiro do Mundo
programme.desc: A história verídica do rapto do neto de 16 anos de um dos homens mais ricos do mundo, Jean Paul Getty, e da tentativa desesperada da sua mãe em convencer o bilionário a pagar o resgate, numa autêntica corrida contra o tempo.

programme.title: O Medalhão
programme.desc: O detetive Eddie Yang sofre um acidente e morre, mas volta à vida com a ajuda de um medalhão, que dá poderes sobrenaturais ao seu detentor. Em conjunto com uma agente da Interpol, Eddie vai tentar descobrir os segredos do artefacto e derrotar o malvado "Cabeça de Cobra".

programme.title: Identidade Desconhecida
programme.desc: Um homem é salvo no mar pela tripulação de um barco de pesca italiano. Meio morto e completamente amnésico, não tem qualquer lembrança do passado ou documento. No entanto, fala várias línguas e possui uma série de conhecimentos de luta e autodefesa que deixam adivinhar um passado perigoso.

programme.title: Alvo Número Um
programme.desc: Em 1989, um jornalista canadiano investiga as circunstâncias em torno da prisão, altamente suspeita, de um viciado em heroína numa prisão tailandesa.

programme.title: Ousadas e Golpistas
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de um grupo de strippers que se unem para preparar uma vingança contra os seus clientes ricos de Wall Street.

programme.title: Hitch - A Cura para o Homem Comum
programme.desc: Em Nova Iorque, Alex Hitchens, um popular médico do coração e das conquistas amorosas, já ajudou inúmeros homens a conquistar a mulher dos seus sonhos. Enquanto treina Albert, um tímido contabilista apaixonado pela sedutora Allegra, Hitch encontra finalmente uma mulher à sua altura.

programme.title: Doidos à Solta
programme.desc: Lloyd e Harry são os maiores desastrados do mundo! Lloyd conduz ao aeroporto a jovem e bela Mary, por quem se apaixona de imediato. Mas a mulher esquece-se da mala onde está o dinheiro que serviria para pagar o resgate do marido. Agora, Lloyd convence o amigo Harry a ir com ele ter com Mary.

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby - Sonhos Vencidos
programme.desc: Frankie Dunn foi agente e treinador dos melhores pugilistas, numa vida passada nos ringues de boxe. Na sequência do doloroso afastamento da sua filha, Frankie revela uma já longa dificuldade na aproximação aos outros. Já Maggie sabe bem o que quer e tem a determinação necessária para o alcançar.

programme.title: O Cadáver de Anna Fritz
programme.desc: Anna Fritz é uma atriz linda e famosa, que acabou de morrer e cujo corpo vai para a morgue. Três jovens decidem ir ver o corpo nu da artista, mas acabam por não resistir à tentação e como resultado mergulham num inferno sem igual, do qual será muito difícil sair.

programme.title: Operação Outubro Negro
programme.desc: Mike Anderson é um repórter e ex-militar que investiga um ataque numa base naval norte-americana no estrangeiro e que tem de fazer uma corrida contra o tempo para desmontar uma intriga terrorista e salvar milhares de vidas inocentes de uma catástrofe.

programme.title: Desculpa! Uma História Sobre Bullying
programme.desc: Jochem é vítima de bullying na escola. O seu amigo David não participa, mas tem medo de dizer alguma coisa. Quando o diretor da escola conta à turma que Jochem não voltou para casa depois de uma festa, David sente-se culpado. Mas será que é tarde demais?

programme.title: Tal Pai, Tal Mãe
programme.desc: Quando Florence e Vincent recebem, ao mesmo tempo, a promoção profissional há muito desejada, decidem que a sua vida de casal tem de acabar. Depois da guerra conjugal declarada, tudo o que nenhum dos dois quer é ficar com a guarda dos filhos...

programme.title: Estado de Calamidade
programme.desc: No ano 2030, o mundo está num estado de permanente recessão económica e a enfrentar sérios problemas ambientais em consequência do aquecimento global. Noah Kross é um agente do governo que fica sob grave suspeita ao adiar a decisão de enviar uma família para um centro de acolhimento.

programme.title: Paydirt
programme.desc: Um indivíduo em liberdade condicional junta-se à sua antiga equipa, que está determinada a encontrar um saco enterrado de dinheiro roubado há uma década, proveniente de uma rusga da DEA que correu mal. Ao mesmo tempo, é perseguido por um xerife reformado.

programme.title: Linda de Morrer
programme.desc: Na pequena cidade americana de Mount Rose, o muito aguardado concurso anual de beleza começa a gerar as maiores suspeitas quando várias concorrentes vão morrendo de forma misteriosa e se torna claro que há alguém a querer vencer a qualquer custo.

programme.title: Os Gloriosos 39
programme.desc: Às vésperas da Segunda Guerra Mundial, a filha adotiva de um destacado político britânico vai descobrir um segredo que envolve os dois lados do conflito.

programme.title: À Deriva
programme.desc: O destino aproxima o jovem casal, mas também os conduz à aventura de uma vida, quando têm de enfrentar um dos terramotos mais catastróficos da história. Inspirado em factos verídicos.

programme.title: Combate ao Passado
programme.desc: O agente Michael Dixon patrulha a fronteira entre os EUA e o México. A sua vida vai dar uma reviravolta quando a sua mulher e a filha são ameaçadas de morte por um gangue de Los Angeles a que ele outrora pertenceu e que o quer forçar a ajudar a traficar drogas entre os dois países.

programme.title: Supremacia
programme.desc: Bourne abandonou a vida de assassino da CIA e tem vivido, com Marie, uma vida no anonimato. No entanto, quando a localização dos dois é descoberta, Bourne vai ter de lutar pela sobrevivência do casal.

programme.title: Ultimato
programme.desc: Jason Bourne é um assassino profissional que, depois de perder a memória e a única pessoa que amava, não se deixa intimidar pelas rajadas de balas de uma nova geração de assassinos altamente treinados, que perseguem todos os seus movimentos.

programme.title: Comportem-se Como Adultos
programme.desc: Grécia 2015: a economia está no caos e o país à beira da bancarrota. Um novo governo revolta-se contra as regras restritivas da União Europeia e inspira milhões de europeus. O Ministro das Finanças grego, Yanis Varoufakis, vai ser o protagonista desse combate.

programme.title: Le Chant du Loup - Ameaça em Alto Mar
programme.desc: Chanteraide tem o raro dom de conseguir identificar todos os sons que ouve. A bordo de um submarino nuclear francês, tudo depende dele, só que, reputado como infalível, ele acaba por cometer um erro que coloca toda a equipa em perigo de morte.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: Scorpion
Scorpion
programme.desc:
Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. I would recommend seeing a doctor about removing the sticks from your butts.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-22","keywords":"homeland security,outcast,misfit,nerd,brilliant mind","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1175468/","name":"Elyes Gabel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897713/","name":"Katharine McPhee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858776/","name":"Eddie Kaye Thomas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500483/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1238801/","name":"Nick Santora"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2548022553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby"}}</script><metacontent="

An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. IMDb data; ttnr: 3514324, Title: Scorpion, --- Description: Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173","dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. programme.title: Scorpion
Scorpion
programme.desc:
Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. I would recommend seeing a doctor about removing the sticks from your butts.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-22","keywords":"homeland security,outcast,misfit,nerd,brilliant mind","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1175468/","name":"Elyes Gabel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897713/","name":"Katharine McPhee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858776/","name":"Eddie Kaye Thomas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500483/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1238801/","name":"Nick Santora"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2548022553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job.
